name: Ponggers
description:
So i made a pong but in 3D and with memes. It's my first real attempt at making something playable. I learned a bit of unreal, had my unfinished learning projects now it's time to make a game, and i'm starting from the very beginning.

From version 0.1.2 you can now play with AI but you can't win. Set multiplayer option in options.

Controls:

Universal:

Spacebar - Spawn the ball

R - Destroy the ball

Esc - Quit the game

First Player:

W/S - Move up and down

A/D - Rotate left and right

Q - Memes (Inactive)

Left Ctrl - Speed up

Second Player:

Arrow keys to move and rotate

Enter - Memes (Inactive)

Right Ctrl - Speed up

Credits (Music):
